meta.name: description
meta.content: The District serves approximately 1500 students from Pre-Kindergarten through Eighth Grade in two elementary schools (Ridge Lawn and Ridge Central) and one junior high school (Finley Junior High)

div.a: Coronavirus (Covid-19), Updates and Resources by District 127.5

div.h4: In response to the growing concern about the potential spread and impact of the COVID-19 (Coronavirus), we want to reassure you that the district is closely monitoring the news and updates from the Illinois Department of Health (IDPH) and the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Click here for more information from District 127.5.
